# Webscraping

The web is an amazing repository of data. Some of the pages don't change very often, while others are changing frequently. Some examples:

* The table showing the latest unemployment rate in Canada, published by Statistics Canada, is updated monthly.

* The [Billboard Hot 100 music chart](https://www.billboard.com/charts/hot-100) is updated weekly.

* The Environment Canada weather forecast page for [Victoria, British Columbia](https://weather.gc.ca/past_conditions/index_e.html?station=yyj) is updated every hour (as is the similar page for .
